{placeholder: "Enter a LEA name", 
width: 1500,
label: "Search Law Enforcement Agencies"
})

viewof fe_rows = Inputs.table(lea_search, {
  columns: [
    'lea_name',
  ],
  format: {
    'lea_name': x => htl.html`<button type="button" class="leas">${x}</button>`,
  },
  width: {
    lea_name: 900,
  },
//   height: { 

//   }
})
